org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel
Class AeInvokeHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel.AeInvokeHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeInvokeHandler, IAePolicyConstants
public class AeInvokeHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeInvokeHandler, IAePolicyConstants

Handles invoking of endpoint references on behalf of the business process engine.

Method Detail

handleInvoke

public IAeWebServiceResponse handleInvoke(IAeInvoke aInvokeQueueObject,
                                          java.lang.String aQueryData)
Invokes the partner operation. This is done by utlizing the endpoint reference info to create an axis service and the operation information in the queue object to create the call. The input message is then moved to the call input and vica versa on output.

Specified by:
handleInvoke in interface IAeInvokeHandler
Parameters:
aInvokeQueueObject -
See Also:
IAeInvokeHandler.handleInvoke(org.activebpel.wsio.invoke.IAeInvoke, java.lang.String)

isWsaMandatory

protected boolean isWsaMandatory(IAeWebServiceEndpointReference aPartnerEndpoint,
                                 IAeWebServiceEndpointReference aMyEndpoint)
                          throws AeWsAddressingException
Mandatory WSA information should be added automatically if 1. we have a ReplyTo address from the partner endpoint reference properties --OR-- 2. we have headers required for engine managed correlation in the default reply to ref props TODO: Use the 2006 WSA SOAP Binding spec to decide this in the future

Throws:
AeWsAddressingException

getSoapAction

protected java.lang.String getSoapAction(javax.wsdl.Service aWsdlService,
                                         java.lang.String aOperationName,
                                         IAeWebServiceEndpointReference aEndpointRef)
                                  throws AeBusinessProcessException
Look for the value of a soapAction attribute. If no action is explicitly defined in wsdl, returns the implicit action based on the service namespace and operation name since WS-Addressing mandates the use of a wsa:Action header
